a.style: background-color: #172b3e; color: #ffffff; cursor: pointer; padding: 5px 12px; margin-top: 20px;

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-2 content text-center narrow col-1

div.p: Legacy Traditional Schools puts the focus back where it should be: on our kids. It’s easy to see why Legacy continues to be the highest rated Kindergarten-8th grade charter school network in Arizona. It starts with one student striving to be his/her best, and it continues to impact nearly 19,000 students network-wide. We hope you’ll take a moment to see why Legacy is the right choice for your family.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-4 content text-center narrow col-1

p.span: At Legacy, we know success comes from more than just classroom study. We focus on developing well-rounded kids who are ready to take on the world when they leave our doors.

a.span: Why is Legacy the right choice for your family? >

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-5 content align-content text-left border col-3
component component-builder component-builder-6 success-story-preview cta , success-story

div.h2: Your child’s success is our success.

div.p: We don’t measure our success merely by test scores or grades of our students (although they are important and you’ll find no higher scores anywhere). Our success is mostly evident in the lives our students and alumni are living. You can see them developing confidence, living true to their character, and changing their communities for the better. What’s in store for your student? We can’t wait to see…

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-7 content text-left col-1

p.span: We started our district as a small campus in Maricopa, but have taken the same core educational philosophies to expand our district to over 12 campuses across Arizona and Nevada. Chances are, there’s a campus in your area that is waiting for your student.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-8 schools-map content narrow col-1

select.title: Select the Legacy School in your community

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-10 content text-center narrow col-1

div.h2: Start your child’s life at Legacy Traditional School
div.p: We care about your child just like you do, and we want the very best for them, too. There is no better way to prepare them for future success than with a well-rounded education at Legacy.

div.div: © 2020 Copyright Legacy Traditional Schools All rights reserved.
